name: ios-development-assistant
description: iOS development plugin with agents for Swift, UIKit, SwiftUI, and App Store deployment
author: Roadmap Team

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start guided learning path selection for your career goals

commands.name: browse-roadmap
commands.description: Explore and filter all 75+ available roadmaps by role, technology, or difficulty

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Evaluate your current knowledge level and get personalized learning recommendations

commands.name: compare-paths
commands.description: Compare learning paths between different roles to find the best fit for your goals
